Uses of Package
org.daisy.pipeline.script

  • Packages that use org.daisy.pipeline.script 
    Package Description
    org.daisy.pipeline.job
    Jobs are executable units which offer a richer context than executing a XProcPipeline by itself.
    org.daisy.pipeline.script
    Enhanced XprocPipelines with extra metadata to detail the input/output media-type, option directions, script authors and other details.
  • Classes in org.daisy.pipeline.script used by org.daisy.pipeline.job 
    Class and Description
    BoundScript 
    Script
    Script description.
    ScriptInput 
  • Classes in org.daisy.pipeline.script used by org.daisy.pipeline.script 
    Class and Description
    BoundScript 
    BoundScript.Builder 
    Script
    Script description.
    Script.Builder
    Builder for Script objects.
    ScriptInput 
    ScriptInput.Builder 
    ScriptOption
    Script option description.
    ScriptPort
    Script port description.
    ScriptRegistry
    Keeps track of the scripts defined by the loaded modules.
    ScriptService
    Script proxy.
    XProcOptionMetadata
    Metadata associated with an option of an XProc step through custom px:* attributes.
    XProcOptionMetadata.Output 
    XProcPortMetadata
    Metadata associated with a port of an XProc step through custom px:* attributes.
    XProcScript
    XProc based implementation of Script
    XProcScript.Builder
    Builder for XProcScript objects.
    XProcScript.XProcScriptOption 
    XProcScriptService
    Implementation of ScriptService based on an XProc step with some extra information such as port and option metadata.
